item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 20 Apr 2021
item.description:
1. Preface (initial release)
  2. OCaml Users and Developers Workshop 2021
  3. Timere 0.1.3 - Dealing with time and time zones has never been easier
  4. Release of ~multipart_form.0.2.0~
  5. Engineer position for the development of the Squirrel prover
  6. Martin Jambon presentation on Semgrep, Wed April 21 @ 7pm Central
